heading: Monday Night
text: Partly to mostly cloudy. Scattered early snow showers north. Lows in the teens to around 20, except low to mid 20s in the broad valleys west. Winds becoming light and variable.

heading: Tuesday
text: Morning snow developing south and west of Interstate 89, spreading north and east in the afternoon; 1 to 2 inches, up to 3 inches in the hills. Highs from the mid 20s to around 30, except low to mid 30s in far southern valleys and in the Champlain Valley. South to southeast winds 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Tuesday Night
text: Cloudy. Snow likely, tapering off near and south of Route 4 after midnight; another 1 to 3 inches, with locally higher amounts in the northern Greens. Lows from the mid 20s to around 30 south, and upper teens to mid 20s north, with some lower 20s far north. Southeast 5 to 15 mph, becoming  northwest late.
